summary.purpose: Math utility functions for numeric arithmetic operations.
summary.problem_solved: Provides reusable, type-safe arithmetic helper functions for use throughout Akeyless client applications, avoiding inline repetition of common numeric operations.

exports.name: multiply
exports.description_one_line: Multiplies two numbers and returns the product.

symbols.name: multiply
symbols.description_one_line: Multiplies two numbers and returns the product.

returns.description: The product of a and b.

details.what_it_does: Takes two numeric arguments and returns their product (a Ã— b). Pure function with no side effects or external dependencies.

minimal_correct.title: Basic multiplication
minimal_correct.code:
import { multiply } from 'akeyless-client-commons';
const result = multiply(3, 4); // 12
